name: ScheduleBlogPost
description:
Schedule a blog post for future publication.

This tool is used to schedule a HubSpot CMS blog post to be published at a specific time. It should be called when you want to set a future publication date for a blog post.

parameters.name: scheduled_publish_date
parameters.description: The date and time when the blog post should be published, formatted as a string (e.g., '2023-12-31T23:59:59').

value_schema.description: The date the object should transition from scheduled to published.

parameters.name: blog_post_id
parameters.description: The ID of the blog post to be scheduled for future publication.

value_schema.description: The ID of the object to be scheduled.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: publishDate
parameters.description: The date the object should transition from scheduled to published.

value_schema.description: The date the object should transition from scheduled to published.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the object to be scheduled.

value_schema.description: The ID of the object to be scheduled.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
